markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Clockwork Door Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1946)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This mechanical humanoid serves the role of a gatekeeper or even a greeter, but its strength also enables it to repel unwanted visitors.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Clockwork Door Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1946)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +4

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Wind-Up** 24 hours, DC 19, standby

**Items**
[Repeating Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=160) (5 bolts)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +10 (+12 vs. [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41))

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 50

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poisoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
physical 5 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=372) or orichalcum)

**Weaknesses**
[electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 5, [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=378) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +14 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+7 bludgeoning plus [Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=25)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
repeating hand crossbow +12 ([range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [Repeating](/Traits.aspx?ID=374)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Brace Door** <actions string="Single Action" />  The door warden holds shut an adjacent door. This ends the door warden's turn. Until the start of its next turn, as long as it remains functional and in the same square, other creatures trying to get through must succeed at a DC 21 [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34) the door.

**Slam Door** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Trigger** The door warden [Pushes](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=25) a creature through an open doorway; **Effect** The door warden slams the door shut on the creature.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-223" />
name: Clockwork Door Warden

---

</summary>

Until the start of its next turn, as long as it remains functional and in the same square, other creatures trying to get through must succeed at a DC 21 Athletics check to Force Open the door.
